subject: Using Quickscript
msgSnippet: OK, you all know I m new to using Quickscript, you all have much more experience than me.  Let me ask--do any of you personally use any joins or alternate
messageBody:
OK, you all know I'm new to using Quickscript, you all have much more experience than me.  Let me ask--do any of you personally use any joins or alternate forms besides those in QM or CFPB?
 
To me, it seems that Gig can be joined from below or above.  A loop going into it from the top short line or the bottom short line to connect with the top part of the letter at the right can't be confused with anything else.  Also,  I discovered a possible alternate letter (for private written use, of course, not for the proposal) for Loll.  I experimented today with using the backwards Loll (p8, QM) to as an alternate form drawn from the top down.  Worked pretty well.
 
Are there any other tips?
 
hQ fAst kAn y'Yl rFt iG rId?
---
Shalom v'Tovah,
Jon Zuck
Web URL: http://surf.to/frimmin
 
It is more important to love much than to think much.
Always do that which most impels you to love.
                                      --St. Teresa of Avila
